TopicTitle: Possible Bot abuse on the Bug Tracker...???

Articles.Content:
Yesterday there were a few really strange issues added to the bug-tracker, are these bots getting through the system and raising issues or just idiots creating fluff and garbage?

I only raise attention here as it would be a crying shame if the bug tracker became a location prime for abuse in this way as it would only be cause for SQUAD to not give the tracker the attention it deserves.

https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/21055

https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/21056

https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/21058
Internal software stuff, done with Squad's knowledge and approval. Thank you for pointing it out, though.
